name: 天降锦鲤 ~ My Lucky Koi
name_original: 天降锦鲤 ~ My Lucky Koi
description:
This is a Chinese short visual novel with single ending.
Its`A humorous Daily story.


剧情简介
——A friendship story between a hard worker and a Koi leprechaun.
It is said that koi is an auspicious Totem！
I didn't believe it before. Now The road is tortuous, the future is really fragrant!!!

Works category Minesweeper: Easy. Funny. daily. Sweet system. Adventure. Short story. Inspirational.


CV 海棠不言
天降系腹黑妖精，抢着为我还花呗的怪人。
试图努力挽回主角的信仰，却总是弄巧成拙。


CV 恪诀
温柔的猫咖店老板大姐姐，似乎与瑞瑞有不共戴天之仇？


（无CV）
以及各路奇怪甲乙丙丁戊己庚辛壬癸……

游戏剧本字数：约5w字
